Content:: Dimuthu Bandara Abayakoon (born September 6, 1971) is a Sri Lankan politician, belonging to the Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna.[1] In the 2004 election he was elected as a representative of Kandy District in the Parliament of Sri Lanka, standing as a United People's Freedom Alliance candidate. He resides in Kandy.[2] He is an alumnus of Dharmaraja College.  This article about a politician from Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Dimuthu Bandara Abayakoon - Wikipedia
